dct_title_s: Ducatus Vrbini nova et exacta descriptio
dct_alternative_sm: Dvcatvs Vrbini nova et exacta descriptio
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Scala milliarium Italicorum"; 16 units [= 185 mm].
Decorative cartouches containing title (bottom) and dedication (right), coat of arms, ship and sea monster.
From Ortelius' Theatrum orbis terrarum, 1612, Latin edition.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
